About.title: Bruno Lima
About.subtitle: Front-End Developer
About.description: My name is Bruno Lima and I’m currently studying Systems Analysis and Development at Fatec. I work as a front-end developer, but I’m also interested in backend and aim to become a full-stack developer in the future. Currently, I’m gaining practical experience as an intern, improving my skills and exploring new technologies. In addition, I develop personal projects to solidify my learning and expand my portfolio.

Experience.title: Experience
Experience.description: I develop modern and responsive websites focused on user experience, API integration, SEO optimization, and structured data implementation for better visibility and ranking in search engines.

project.title: Coffee Delivery
project.description: Coffee Delivery is a catalog and coffee shopping web page.

project.title: Shop 2.0
project.description: Project using Redux for the first time. It's a shirt catalog page, featuring a basic slider, cart functionality, and checkout.

project.title: Pokedex
project.description: Project involving manipulation of the PokéAPI, pagination, and Pokémon search by ID or name.

project.title: Login System
project.description: Fullstack application based on user creation and authentication, with backend validation.

project.title: God of War - Ragnarok
project.description: Landing page project created at the time of the game’s launch.

project.title: Bikcraft
project.description: An e-commerce project for bicycles. One of the first large-scale projects I developed.
